moves.3. c3: I really like this opening. Will he take it?
moves.4. Nxc3:
Now, I have my N. developed, an open file for my Q., and both my B.s have clear paths. 
Black, on the other hand, has taken 2 pawns but has yet to develop any pieces.
moves.4... Bb4:
Black pins my N. 
I'll allow the exchange while I develop another piece.
moves.6. bxc3 Nf6: Black threatens my central position, but what he really wants is to castle.
moves.7. Ba3: Ba3 cuts off his path to castle.
moves.8... dxe5: He takes out the threat, but again, his path for castling is threatened.
moves.9... Qd5: Q threatens Q...maybe he wants to trade.
moves.10. Bc4: But I don't. Force the Q back.
moves.11... Qf5: Black moves out of harms way..
moves.12. Bb5+: But now its really going to hit the fan.
moves.12... c6: Not worried about the threat to my B because it's all over now. Can you see it?
